version_description:
v1.6
Winter is here - Happy Holidays! Come visit the snowy monster village to watch new song and story videos about the Christmas and other festive days!
• We added a new video pack, Festival Fun. Swipe to the second screen to find it and watch videos about Christmas, New Year and other festivals.
• Subscribe to our newsletter! Go the Parents' area and tap the newsletter button to get our monthly newsletter with tips to help your child learn English.
• Other improvements.

v1.5
Happy Halloween! It’s night time in the monster village now. We’ve added a new video pack, Spooky Special. Swipe to the second screen to find it. Subscribe to watch stories about casting spells, exploring the woods and haunted houses.
Ni hao 你好！We added Chinese language. Go to the Parents' area to change the language.

v2.0
• We redesigned and expanded the monster village! Swipe to explore multiple screens.
• New beautifully illustrated videos - Shakespeare Lives! This video pack includes six of Shakespeare’s most famous plays such as Macbeth and Romeo and Juliet, as well as a biography of Shakespeare. The plays have been rewritten especially for children and use simple English. This pack of videos is part of the British Council's 'Shakespeare Lives' programme which marks the death of Britain's most famous playwright 400 years ago.
• Other improvements.

v1.6
Winter is here - Happy Holidays! Come visit the snowy monster village to watch new song and story videos about the Christmas and other festive days!
• We added a new video pack, Festival Fun. Swipe to the second screen to find it and watch videos about Christmas, New Year and other festivals.
• Subscribe to our newsletter! Go the Parents' area and tap the newsletter button to get our monthly newsletter with tips to help your child learn English.
• Other improvements.

v2.1
• We’ve corrected a few typos in the subtitles of one of the videos. Thank you LzParis for your feedback about this! If you have any other feedback or comments, please email us at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org so that we can improve the app.

v2.0
• We redesigned and expanded the monster village! Swipe to explore multiple screens.
• New beautifully illustrated videos - Shakespeare Lives! This video pack includes six of Shakespeare’s most famous plays such as Macbeth and Romeo and Juliet, as well as a biography of Shakespeare. The plays have been rewritten especially for children and use simple English. This pack of videos is part of the British Council's 'Shakespeare Lives' programme which marks the death of Britain's most famous playwright 400 years ago.
• Other improvements.

v2.2
- Minor bug fixes

v2.1
- We’ve corrected a few typos in the subtitles of one of the videos. Thank you LzParis for your feedback about this! If you have any other feedback or comments, please email us at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org so that we can improve the app.

v2.0
- We redesigned and expanded the monster village! Swipe to explore multiple screens.
- New beautifully illustrated videos - Shakespeare Lives! This video pack includes six of Shakespeare’s most famous plays such as Macbeth and Romeo and Juliet, as well as a biography of Shakespeare. The plays have been rewritten especially for children and use simple English. This pack of videos is part of the British Council's 'Shakespeare Lives' programme which marks the death of Britain's most famous playwright 400 years ago.
- Other improvements.

v2.3
- We have added detailed descriptions for each pack of videos to help you see what your child can learn. Just touch the "What can I learn?" icon in each pack so see the descriptions.
- Other small bug fixes

- Added the second Super Fun pack with new songs and videos
- Fixed bugs to improve performances

Happy Halloween! It’s that spooky time of year in the monster village. We’ve added a new video pack, Grammar Chants 1. Swipe the screen to find it, and subscribe to watch to 10 brand new videos created to improve your grammar.

v2.5.1
- Fixed a bug in the spooky animation

v2.5.2
- Fixed some bugs and improved app performance

• Let it snow – we have added our chilly new winter theme
• Fun new games for our Story Time and Wonderful World packs
• Improved functionality – you can now cancel a pack download once it has started!
Fixed some wintery bugs.

In this update we added "Grammar Chants 2" - the second in a series of three packs designed to help you learn grammar and have fun at the same time.  We also improved the security of Playtime for all our users and fixed a few bugs!
In this update, we've made some minor speed and performance improvements. If you have any feedback or comments, please send us an email on learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org!

v2.10
In this update, we've added some fun new games in Speak and Spell 1, 2 and 3. If you have any feedback or comments, please send us an email at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org!
Standard performance update. If you have any feedback or comments on LearnEnglish Kids: Playtime, please let us know at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org!

Happy Halloween! It’s that spooky time of year in the monster village. But don't be afraid - we’ve added a new video pack, Grammar Chants 3 - the last in our popular series of Grammar Chant videos. Swipe the screen to find it, and subscribe to watch to 10 brand new videos created to improve your grammar.
Standard performance update. Please let us know if you have any comments on how we can improve the app at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org!

We’re excited to bring you a snowy monster village! In this update, we’ve introduced two NEW games in the Children’s Songs and Easy English Songs story packs. We've also improved the functionality of the 'Spelling game' and the 'Speaking activity' to make it easier for you to use.
If you have any comments or feedback, please let us know at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org, we love hearing from our users!

Happy Lunar New Year! We've updated the Monster Village theme and introduced a Lunar New Year theme in our subscription page. We hope you enjoy LearnEnglish Kids: Playtime! If you have any comments or suggestions, do let us know by sending us an email at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org.
We've updated the monster village and made some performance improvements. We hope you enjoy this version of LearnEnglish Kids: Playtime!
BUG FIX - v2.15 (the previous version) had a bug which meant that some of our 6 months subscribers could not restore the video packs. This bug has now been fixed!

Thanks for updating LearnEnglish Kids: Playtime. In this update, we are launching a NEW Grammar game where children can practise parts of speech while playing! The grammar game allows children to identify parts of speech such as nouns, adjectives and verbs. The questions in the new Grammar game are also available in French, Simplified Chinese and Spanish!

If you enjoy LearnEnglish Kids: Playtime, do leave us a review, we read every single one of them!

Happy Halloween! It’s that terrifying time of year in the monster village. But don't be too afraid  because we’ve added fun new Grammar Games to our ‘Spooky Special’ and ‘Shakespeare Lives’ packs. Swipe the screen to find them, and subscribe to enjoy ALL the songs, stories and activities Playtime has to offer!  In this version we have also updated our Privacy Policy to keep you and your family safe and informed.

It's that wonderful time of the year! We’re excited to bring back our snowy monster village! In this update, we’ve introduced two NEW games in the Festive Fun and Friends Pack. We've also optimised the app for new iPhones.
If you have any comments or feedback, please let us know at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org, we love hearing from our users!
We redesigned the app icon! We hope you like it. If you have any other feedback or comments, please email us at learnenglish.mobile@britishcouncil.org so that we can improve the app.

Happy Halloween Playtime family! In this spooky update we have not only added our Halloween theme we have done a lot more. We have:
-added progress details to the main activity zone to motivate your child to learn regularly
-added video titles and spaced the video thumbnails to make learning more accessible and easier for everyone
-improved the look and navigation of the ‘Game Centre’
-added new Grammar Games to the ‘Speak and Spell’ packs
-redesigned the ‘Parent Zone’ to make subscription decision making and management easier
We hope you enjoy it!
-fixed some bugs

Grammar with Gran 1&2 have brand new grammar games.
The snow has gone and blue skies have returned to the monster village.
The app is better, faster and bug free!
General bug fixes
Playtime 家族，万圣节快乐！在这个诡异的更新，我们加入了紫色万圣节主题。希望大家喜欢！
